text: <@U05NR1PG32T>, recently heard back from the product manager that the custom module support is currently being worked on.
Thanks <@U042JNC6ZAM> for that update! Will be great to see that roll out.

If you have Marketing Pro and just want to have the header and footer preset but don't need to prevent editing then you could also <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/marketing-email/save-your-marketing-email-as-a-template|save the dnd email as a template>. You can also save sections for quicker dnd build-out
`module.repeater_field|length` will return the length. Then you can do whatever you want with it
